activities.name: Check In to Hotel Get Ready for Dinner
Dinner at Vyoone's
activities.notes: We have a 7:15 reservation. Vyoone Segue Lewis is a classical clarinetist, a pediatric geneticist, and a real estate developer with French and Afro-Creole roots — so why wouldn’t she run a French restaurant in a historic Warehouse District building? Expect an impeccable French onion soup, duck à l’orange, and other Gallic classics that are well-loved.
